FuncDef: This command configures the Route Distinguisher (RD) component that will be signaled in the MP-BGP NLRI for EVPN corresponding to the base EVPN instance (Ethernet Segment routes). If the route-distinguisher component is not configured, the system will use system:ip-address as the default route-distinguisher

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address. Values-ip-addr: a.b.c.d.
Specifies the AS number. Values-as-number: 1 to 65535.
